note.p: Civil servant, poet, and writer. Served as a clerk in the Admiralty, Whitehall, 1853–66. Appointed an inspector of fisheries, 1866. Author of poetry and books on angling. Editor of Fisherman’s Magazine and Review, 1864–5.
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 26 January 2016)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 26 January 2016)

p.hi: Men and women of the time
